description:
Emerging from the tunnel, you enter a vast chamber - a natural stone cathedral deep within the rock of Sundered Peak.
Hanging amid the stalactites suspended from the roof of the cavern are pendulous, silk-wrapped egg-sacs, like those made by spiders, although each of these is as big as a treasure chest.
As you cross the chamber, you detect movement above you.
Looking up into the gloom you see several of the scas split open and the giant spider hatchlings emerge.
Each has a distinctive set of markings on its abdomen, in the form of a grinning Death's Head, and each hatches with the instinctive desire to hunt!
